verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Hallelujah! Amen! newline Hallelujah! Amen! newline Hallelujah! Amen! newline Amen! Amen!

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: How oft in holy converse with Christ, newline My Lord alone, newline I seem to hear the millions newline That sing around His throne:

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: They passed thro' toils and trials newline And, tho' the strife was long, newline They share the victor's conquest, newline And sing the victor's song:

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: My soul takes up the chorus newline And, pressing on my way, newline Communing still with Jesus, newline I sing from day to day:

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Thro' grace I soon shall conquer, newline And reach my home on high; newline And thro' eternal ages newline I'll shout beyond the sky:
